member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas
member.summary: Custom implementation of the BOOSE ICanvas interface. Provides unrestricted drawing functionality for lines, shapes, and text.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes the drawing canvas with a specified width and height.
member.param: Width of the canvas in pixels.
Height of the canvas in pixels.

member.name: P:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Xpos
member.summary: Gets or sets the current X-coordinate of the drawing cursor.

member.name: P:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Ypos
member.summary: Gets or sets the current Y-coordinate of the drawing cursor.

member.name: P:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.PenColour
member.summary: Gets or sets the pen color used for drawing.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Circle(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws or fills a circle on the canvas.
member.param: If true, fills the circle; otherwise, outlines it.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Clear
member.summary: Clears the canvas to a white background.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a line from the current cursor position to the specified coordinates.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.getBitmap
member.summary: Returns the current bitmap image of the canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the cursor to the specified coordinates without drawing.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Rect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws or fills a rectangle.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Reset
member.summary: Resets the cursor to its default position (100,100).

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Set(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a new bitmap canvas with the given dimensions.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.SetColour(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the pen color using RGB values.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.Tri(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a triangle from the current position.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.WriteText(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text at the current cursor position.

member.summary: Default constructor for the Circle command.

member.summary: Executes the unrestricted circle drawing operation.

member.summary: Validates the parameters for the circle command.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory
member.summary: Custom command factory that returns unrestricted drawing commands. Overrides the default factory to provide enhanced functionality.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory.MakeCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new command based on the command type string.
member.returns: An instance of the corresponding command class.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.AppMoveTo
member.summary: Represents an unrestricted MoveTo command. Moves the drawing cursor without coordinate restrictions.

member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:BOOSEapp.AppMoveTo.Execute
member.summary: Executes the MoveTo command.

member.name: T:BOOSEapp.Form1
member.summary: Main Windows Form that serves as the BOOSE drawing environment. Allows users to write and execute BOOSE programs that render shapes.

member.summary: Initializes the Form and configures the BOOSE environment components.

member.summary: Clears the canvas and refreshes the display.
